医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究可能揭示抵消高血压对认知影响的新方法美国国立卫生研究院支持的一项研究表明，大脑周围保护层内的免疫系统细胞的反应可能会导致慢性高血压患者的认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Study-may-shed-light-on-new-ways-to-counteract-the-effects-of-high-blood-Pressure-on-cognition。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Study-may-shed-light-on-new-ways-to-counteract-the-effects-of-high-blood-Pressure-on-cognition。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce25dc2e-13e6-4f37-9755-453b4cd38b25 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 14:37:09 -0500 Study may shed light on new ways to counteract the effects of high blood pressure on cognition
研究利用生物分子缩合物抑制前列腺癌中的雄激素受体转录因子在将基因编码的遗传信息转化为所有细胞和生物体中的蛋白质方面发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Study-exploits-biomolecular-condensates-to-inhibit-androgen-receptor-in-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Study-exploits-biomolecular-condensates-to-inhibit-androgen-receptor-in-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0e41de7-48eb-4759-8678-78ab7566e5c7 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 14:20:17 -0500 Study exploits biomolecular condensates to inhibit androgen receptor in prostate cancer
加州 20% 的“活着”患者实际上已经死亡，浪费医疗资源根据加利福尼亚州的数据，大约 20% 的病历显示患有严重疾病的患者实际上已经死亡，这导致了数百次不必要的互动，例如预约提醒、处方补充和其他类型的浪费性外展活动，从而导致资源和医疗保健紧张工人的时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/2025-of-living-病人-in-California-are-actually-dead-wasting-healthcare-resources.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/2025-of-living-病人-in-California-are-actually-dead-wasting-healthcare-resources.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c90b9fa-6648-4322-8e63-c2d32638fad1 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 14:11:48 -0500 20% of "living" patients in California are actually dead, wasting healthcare resources
研究利用博弈论表明低肿瘤异质性导致更高的攻击性巴斯克大学 (UPV/EHU) 的一项研究利用博弈论确定细胞异质性较低的肿瘤更具侵袭性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Study-uses-game-theory-to-show-low-tumor-heterogeneity-leads-to-higher-aggression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Study-uses-game-theory-to-show-low-tumor-heterogeneity-leads-to-higher-aggression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a435afb5-174d-4e56-8102-6b7f9d3bea69 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 13:57:44 -0500 Study uses game theory to show low tumor heterogeneity leads to higher aggression
重建生育和教育数据的创新建模框架IIASA 研究人员引入了一种创新方法来重建生育和教育数据，特别是在数据集不一致或不可靠的发展中国家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Innovative-modeling-framework-to-reconstruct-data-on-fertility-and-education.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Innovative-modeling-framework-to-reconstruct-data-on-fertility-and-education.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27fb3fa0-e778-4c96-8da8-db707285beb6 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 13:47:18 -0500 Innovative modeling framework to reconstruct data on fertility and education
患者希望 Profemur 人工髋关节能够持续使用。然后它们折断成两半。 2017 年，亚利桑那州的体育老师布拉德利·利特尔 (Bradley Little) 带领全班同学穿过学校走廊时晕倒了。很少有人担心他会中风。或者，作为时代的标志，他被枪杀了。他想站起来，但腿却动不了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Patients-expected-Profemur-artificial-hips-to-last-Then-they-snapped-in-half.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Patients-expected-Profemur-artificial-hips-to-last-Then-they-snapped-in-half.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb94fe98-6ade-4fa4-a5dc-74ea11336e66 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 13:31:04 -0500 Patients expected Profemur artificial hips to last. Then they snapped in half.
生命科学实验室自动化和数字化的过去、现在和未来在本次采访中，News-Medical 与 Klaus Lun 博士和 Chris Mason 讨论了生命科学实验室自动化和数字化的过去、现在和未来，特别是这可能对下一代测序和基因组学产生的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/The-past-present-and-future-of-automation-and-digitalization-in-the-life-sciences-laboratory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/The-past-present-and-future-of-automation-and-digitalization-in-the-life-sciences-laboratory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3169b4f7-ad9a-4a0b-9618-dcc63af49c47 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 11:28:00 -0500 The past, present and future of automation and digitalization in the life sciences laboratory
饮食限制（包括间歇性禁食）如何影响肠道微生物群和人类整体健康用于分析各种饮食条件下肠道微生物变化的临床前和临床数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/How-dietary-restrictions-include-intermittent-fasting-impact-gut-microbiota-and-overall- human-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/How-dietary-restrictions-include-intermittent-fasting-impact-gut-microbiota-and-overall- human-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=911ae167-4599-4290-8bda-a6c542eb40b7 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 08:09:00 -0500 How dietary restrictions, including intermittent fasting, impact gut microbiota and overall human health
Arxspan BioDrive：分子生物学的多功能解决方案在本次采访中，NewsMedical 向 Arxspan 介绍了其全新的一体化分子生物学解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Arxspan-BioDrive-A-Versatile-Solution-for-Molecular-Biology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Arxspan-BioDrive-A-Versatile-Solution-for-Molecular-Biology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4871c15-4509-4b2e-93bb-2849750a4128 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 08:08:00 -0500 Arxspan BioDrive: A Versatile Solution for Molecular Biology
新型 mRNA 疫苗 GLB-COV2-043 在早期试验中显示出针对 COVID-19 变种的高效功效基于 mRNA 的疫苗的安全性、有效性和免疫原性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Novel-mRNA-vaccine-GLB-COV2-043-shows-high-efficacy-against-COVID-19-variants-in-early-Trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Novel-mRNA-vaccine-GLB-COV2-043-shows-high-efficacy-against-COVID-19-variants-in-early-Trials.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d3b4561-b7a3-481f-bf7a-cbd240c36188 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 07:14:00 -0500 Novel mRNA vaccine GLB-COV2-043 shows high efficacy against COVID-19 variants in early trials
